Indeed, but i think for exampel on firefox you can say that this site is alowed to.
So if you visit souch a site it can tell you how to enable and who benefits. But the site schoud be on namecoin with an official mention in the official repo.

If not, many clones can setup/clome the site and change the recipian of the donations!!
So if we realy like to have souch an donation way, we have to reinvent it as a whole and for zeronet only - looks like a lot of work wich outcome is qestionable

topic.title: ImportError: bad magic number in 'bencode'
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: py3 Rev4129
  * Operating system: linux52
  * Web browser: X
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port: no
  * Special configuration: ____

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

dont start on branch py3; master works fine; complete new py3 works also but then all user data is gone :(

#### Steps to reproduce:

  1. start

#### Observed Results:

[user@pc ZeroNet]$ python3 zeronet.py

```
- Starting ZeroNet...
[02:44:13] PluginManager Plugin AnnounceBitTorrent load error: ImportError: bad magic number in 'bencode': b'\x03\xf3\r\n' in PluginManager.py line 58 > AnnounceBitTorrent/__init__.py line 1 > AnnounceBitTorrent/AnnounceBitTorrentPlugin.py line 6
[02:44:13] PluginManager Plugin Bigfile load error: ImportError: bad magic number in 'merkletools': b'\x03\xf3\r\n' in PluginManager.py line 58 > Bigfile/__init__.py line 1 > Bigfile/BigfilePlugin.py line 20
[02:44:13] - Libsecpk256k1 loaded: CompiledLib in 0.035s
[02:44:13] - Unhandled exception: bad magic number in 'geventwebsocket': b'\x03\xf3\r\n'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "zeronet.py", line 18, in main
    import main
  File "/data/local/ZeroNet/src/main.py", line 63, in <module>
    PluginManager.plugin_manager.loadPlugins()
  File "/data/local/ZeroNet/src/Plugin/PluginManager.py", line 67, in loadPlugins
    func()
  File "/data/local/ZeroNet/plugins/UiConfig/UiConfigPlugin.py", line 14, in importPluginnedClasses
    from Ui import UiWebsocket
  File "/data/local/ZeroNet/src/Ui/__init__.py", line 1, in <module>
    from .UiServer import UiServer
  File "/data/local/ZeroNet/src/Ui/UiServer.py", line 10, in <module>
    from geventwebsocket.handler import WebSocketHandler
ImportError: bad magic number in 'geventwebsocket': b'\x03\xf3\r\n'
---
```

topic.title: 'SiteStorage' object has no attribute 'piecefields'
topic.body:
### Step 1: Please describe your environment

  * ZeroNet version: 47ff6c68018d6bcff0379d7a1cb8d0d5ef1c6799 (py3)
  * Operating system: linux x64
  * Web browser: Chrome
  * Tor status: always
  * Opened port: no

### Step 2: Describe the problem:

just open http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er

#### Observed Results:

Info box show smultible messages with same error:
`Internal error: AttributeError("'SiteStorage' object has no attribute 'piecefields'"): 'SiteStorage' object has no attribute 'piecefields'`
`UiWebsocket.py line 79 > 239 > MergerSite/MergerSitePlugin.py line 174 > 147 > OptionalManager/UiWebsocketPlugin.py line 201 > 67`
